location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 87: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards an extract of a letter, dated 2 February 1850, from the British Agent at Isfahan [Eşfahān] to Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, regarding disturbances in that city. Extract not included.
